product_name: Elemental Herbs All Good Coconut Lip Balm - SPF 20
long_description: Enhanced with the scent of coconut, the Elemental Herbs All Good Coconut Lip Balm soothes dry lips and protects them from exposure. Active ingredient zinc oxide provides SPF 20 protection from UVA and UVB rays. Elemental Herbs All Good Coconut Lip Balm moisturizes lips with 90% organic ingredients.
short_description: Enhanced with the scent of coconut, the Elemental Herbs All Good Coconut Lip Balm soothes dry lips and protects them from exposure.
